name: 紅雀
message: "Phew. That was close."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You barely made it. The top floor, right?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah."
I press the button. The elevator slowly begins to ascend.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Hey, so, I was thinking."

name: 紅雀
message: "Hm?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why'd your guys say the top floor? Is that where Toue is? Or Ryuuhou?"

name: 紅雀
message: "...It's gotta be one of 'em, right? They said they had intel, remember?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess..."
Koujaku looks unsure.
I hate to doubt the guys from Beni-Shigure, but I just can't shake the thought.
Why did they tell us to go to the top floor?
I mean, it makes sense for the boss to be at the top, so maybe that's all it was.
The elevator gradually slows to a stop.
The moment the doors begin to open, I tense up, anticipating more guards.
...But all we see is another long, white hallway.
I check left and right just to be sure, but there's no one lying in wait.
Koujaku and I exchange a glance, then start down the hall.
After a minute or so, we reach a massive door.
We haven't passed any other rooms. This one must take up the entire floor.
We stop just before the door.

name: 紅雀
message: "...They sure are taking their sweet time."
He must mean his Beni-Shigure guys.
They said they'd be right behind us. What happened to them?
Could they have been captured? I hope not.
But we can't wait here forever...
Reluctantly, we approach the door.
